      • getPreferenceProperty

        public java.lang.String getPreferenceProperty(java.lang.String thePropertyName)
        Method to get preference properties. This is to easily expand the set of preferences without having to provide a database attribute for each. The preferences are stored in the database in regular Java property format.
        Parameters:
        thePropertyName - name of property
        Returns:
        the value of the property
